page.title: 17BURGHFIELD-WEEKDAY CLUBS
page.content: Here are some clubs which Samantha, a pupil at Garland Junior School,goes to during the week. "Every Monday,about 34 children meet at the Village Hall for 'Fizzikids',a disco-dancing class.We are very excit- ed because we are entering a competi- tion in June. "Netball Club is on Tuesday and our coach,Mrs Clements,is arranging an interhouse tournament. "Guides meet on Wednesday.My friends are in Kingfisher patrol.I am in Daff- odil patrol with Elizabeth and Sarah. "Sometimes,we play football on Thurs- days.Michael is the captain.He repre- sents Reading and Berkshire. "On Fridays,Mr Whiting runs a Cycling Proficiency Course to help us ride on roads where there is traffic. "on Saturdays,I go to a ballet class. I will be taking an exam soon."
